function.name: cooking_pause
function.description: This function is used to pause the cooking process on a cooker without canceling or stopping it.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking process is being paused.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking process is being paused.
